attributes.action: change the law  on  smacking a child for being naughty
attributes.additional_details:
below is a extract  from a report from the daily mail 

‘Children are often very aware of their rights,’ she says. ‘And parents and teachers are wary of over-stepping boundaries. There is a sense of fear about disciplining children today. Children say: “If you touch me, I’ll contact social services.”’

Read more: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/femail/article-1326439/What-child-attacked-From-toddlers-20-year-olds-more-children-subjecting-parents-terrifying-violence.html#ixzz3hdtjlz3K
attributes.background:
In today's world children know and act upon the fact that adults will go to prison  if they get smacked and they report it to social services.
In fact i have heard them even say to there parents hit me il report you to social services so with parents scared of chastising there is no discipline
